app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Masingo Karaoke
app_description: Masingo Karaoke Singing App Discover the ultimate karaoke party in your pocket with the Masingo singing app perfect for parties family gatherings and impromptu singing sessions! Our all in one karaoke app allows you to watch your favorite music videos all while singing along with the lyrics on screen. Highlights SING ALONG MUSIC VIDEOS No more forgetting words or having to look them up online just immerse yourself in the music with both the lyrics and music video on screen. KARAOKE YOUR WAY The Masingo karaoke app includes adjustable features such as a live Karaoke toggle vocals on and off . Sing along with your favorite artists or switch their vocals off and become the star of the show! CUSTOMIZE YOUR EXPERIENCE Our user friendly app allows you to effortlessly change the lyric size and color to suit your preferences. You can even test your song knowledge and toggle the lyrics on and off the ideal singing app to use if you re learning a song to perform. 100K SONGS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS Access our extensive library of top hits and popular songs across multiple genres no matter what kind of music you love we ve got something for you. Filter search and add your favorite songs to the playlist ready for you to sing again and again. Can t find a song We strive to give our users a first class experience. Fill in our request a song form and we ll do our best to add it to our app. KARAOKE SHOP Want to take karaoke to the next level Visit our in app store and find Masingo s professional karaoke machines and equipment so you can rock those tunes like never before! Whether it s a fun night with friends or a solo jam session before bed Masingo is the perfect karaoke app to let loose and get grooving! Download FREE and start your karaoke performance!
